ContainerImage.description: The `ContainerImage` schema represents a container image available to a computer system.
ContainerImage.longDescription: This resource shall represent a container image available to a computer system.

enumLongDescriptions.DockerV1: This value shall indicate a Docker Image Specification Version 1-defined Docker image.
enumLongDescriptions.DockerV2: This value shall indicate a Docker Image Manifest Version 2-defined Docker image.
enumLongDescriptions.OCI: This value shall indicate an Open Container Specification-defined OCI (Open Container Initiative) image.

title: #ContainerImage.ContainerImage
